lines.text:
[singing, trying to write a song]
In the night, birds in flight...
[talking]
That makes no sense!
[resumes singing]
Birds gotta sing, fish gotta fly...
[talking]
Oh that's better, "fish gotta fly." I'm a great writer, all right.
Why don't you take your magic home and use it on yourself?

[threatening the Sheriff]
Come any closer and you're going to get your Christmas punch early.
In the last election, I cast my ballot for you!
That's great.
There's another one coming up...
Who on earth is "Mountain Dan?"
He eats little kids... and uses their bones for weapons.
If you're packin'...
I'm not packing! I don't even know what it means!
I didn't catch your name.
Well, I didn't throw it yet. It's Luella. Luella Durbin, and I'm just zippin' on down the road apiece, movin' right along!
This is not the end! When I wake up...
...We'll both be old and grey. Come on, lemme help ya down.

[falls to the floor in a deep sleep]
Ugh!

[about Sheriff Jensen]
I don't like him.
You shouldn't ought to not like people, but if you're going to, he's the one not to like!
Never... never... wake up that woman!
[points to Jezebel]
If she were to stay for a spell, she'd be stayin' for one of MY spells!
[evil laugh]

[after the kids ask her if she is an angel that flew down from Heaven]
I came UP here, not DOWN here, darlin'. And I made time, but I didn't fly.

[as disguised Jezebel hands her a poisoned pie in the jail cell]
Are you sure you didn't bake a file in here for me?
Oh, mercy, no. Just apples. And spice. And everything nice.
